issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Implement ColumnReader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4218](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4218). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ColumnReader reads columns in parquet file into arrow array, this's this the first step for reading parquet into arrow.

comments.body:
